\documentclass{article}

\usepackage[latin1]{inputenc}
\usepackage{tikz}

\setlength{\pdfpagewidth}{25.7cm}
\setlength{\pdfpageheight}{6.1cm}
%\setlength{\pdfvorigin}{25.4mm}

%\setlength{\textwidth}{24.2cm}
%\setlength{\textheight}{18cm}
%\setlength{\evensidemargin}{-2.7cm}
\setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-3.1cm}
\setlength{\topmargin}{-4.45cm}
\setlength{\headheight}{2cm}
\setlength{\headsep}{0cm}

\usetikzlibrary{shapes,arrows,shapes.geometric,calc,patterns}

\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{amssymb}
\usepackage{amsthm}
\usepackage{color}

\begin{document}

\pagestyle{empty}

\tikzstyle{block}=[color=black, fill=black!15, rectangle, draw, sharp corners, very thin, node distance=0mm]
\tikzstyle{arrow}=[draw, -latex']

\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=1, auto]

% zeroth order Cartesian multipole moment
\node[block, minimum width=2mm, minimum height=2mm] at (1mm,1mm){};
\node[block, minimum width=6mm, minimum height=2mm] at (5mm,1mm){};
\node[block, minimum width=12mm, minimum height=2mm] at (14mm,1mm){};
\node[block, minimum width=20mm, minimum height=2mm] at (30mm,1mm){};
\node[block, minimum width=30mm, minimum height=2mm] at (55mm,1mm){};
\node[block, minimum width=42mm, minimum height=2mm] at (91mm,1mm){};
\node[block, minimum width=56mm, minimum height=2mm] at (140mm,1mm){};
\node[block, minimum width=72mm, minimum height=2mm] at (204mm,1mm){};

% first order Cartesian multipole moment
\node[block, minimum width=2mm, minimum height=6mm] at (1mm,5mm){};
\node[block, minimum width=6mm, minimum height=6mm] at (5mm,5mm){};
\node[block, minimum width=12mm, minimum height=6mm] at (14mm,5mm){};
\node[block, minimum width=20mm, minimum height=6mm] at (30mm,5mm){};
\node[block, minimum width=30mm, minimum height=6mm] at (55mm,5mm){};
\node[block, minimum width=42mm, minimum height=6mm] at (91mm,5mm){};
\node[block, minimum width=56mm, minimum height=6mm] at (140mm,5mm){};

% second order Cartesian multipole moment
\node[block, minimum width=6mm, minimum height=12mm] at (5mm,14mm){};
\node[block, fill=black!30, minimum width=12mm, minimum height=12mm] at (14mm,14mm){};
\node[block, fill=black!30, minimum width=20mm, minimum height=12mm] at (30mm,14mm){};
\node[block, fill=black!30, minimum width=30mm, minimum height=12mm] at (55mm,14mm){};
\node[block, minimum width=42mm, minimum height=12mm] at (91mm,14mm){};

% third order Cartesian multipole moment
\node[block, fill=black!30, minimum width=12mm, minimum height=20mm] at (14mm,30mm){};
\node[block, fill=black!30, minimum width=20mm, minimum height=20mm] at (30mm,30mm){};
\node[block, fill=black!30, minimum width=30mm, minimum height=20mm] at (55mm,30mm){};

% axis of HGTOs
\node at (1mm,-2mm) {$s$};
\node at (5mm,-2mm) {$p$};
\node at (14mm,-2mm) {$d$};
\node at (30mm,-2mm) {$f$};
\node at (55mm,-2mm) {$g$};
\node at (91mm,-2mm) {$h$};
\node at (140mm,-2mm) {$i$};
\node at (204mm,-2mm) {$j$};
\path[arrow](-0.15mm,-0.15mm)--node[yshift=-10mm] %
  {$\boldsymbol{l}_{\kappa}$ ($\min=2$, $\max=4$)}(246mm,-0.15mm);

% axis of Cartesian multipole moments
\node at (-2mm,1mm) {$s$};
\node at (-2mm,5mm) {$p$};
\node at (-2mm,14mm) {$d$};
\node at (-2mm,30mm) {$f$};
\path[arrow](-0.15mm,-0.15mm)--node[rotate=90, xshift=20mm, yshift=7mm] %
  {$\boldsymbol{N}_{1}$ ($\min=2$, $\max=3$)}(-0.15mm,50mm);

\end{tikzpicture}

\end{document}
